content: written post available here http //sirinscrochet com/crochet-easy-winter-hat/ 1 youtube video tutorial here https //www youtube com/watch v=pxvhgtq2k-g 2 i m here with a warm easy crochet hat tutorial for the upcoming winter days for those looking for a model that is both easy to make and very showy i crochet this hat for adult woman but in the tutorial i explain how it can be adjust to any size you want i hope you like this tutorial materials * size 4 yarn 160m * 4 5mm and 5mm hook * 1 pom pom * tapestry needle stitches used back post double_crochet bpdc chain chain double_crochet double_crochet decrease decrease front post double_crochet fpdc front post triple crochet fptr front loop only flp loop lp single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch skip skip space space triple crochet treble_crochet triple six together tr6tog 1 http //sirinscrochet com/crochet-easy-winter-hat/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=pxvhgtq2k-g
